theme.title: SKYRIM
theme.subtitle: Tundra Echoes â€¢ Nordic Realm
theme.atmosphereDescription: Ten years have passed. The settlement has grown, a new temple stands where a simple home once was, and stone roads now pave the way through the frost.

infoModal.title: Skyrim: A Decade of Growth
paragraphs: The passage of time has seen the tundra settlement evolve. What was once a small collection of huts has grown into a fortified outpost. The Nords have prospered, building a grand temple to the gods and paving roads to connect their people.
The air remains cold, but the fires of the hearth burn brighter than ever. The Dragonborn's legacy continues to inspire those who call this frozen land home.

stats.label: Expansion
stats.description: New stone roads and a grand temple.

stats.label: Population
stats.description: More citizens roaming the paved streets.
